sources.title: Somewhere in Egypt (1943)
sources.description: Gandy Goose and Sourpuss and stationed in Egypt. As Gandy plays an Egyptian tomb, Sourpuss dreams of the terrors (or pleasures?) that await them inside the ancient temples. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/somewhere-in-egypt-1943/

metadata.Plot: It's wartime in occupied Egypt, and Sourpuss and Gandy Goose are stationed, apparently, right in front of the Sphinx. Gandy plays a soothing, exotic melody as Sourpuss drifts off to sleep, where he dreams that he and Gandy have ridden a magic carpet into the ancient Egyptian tombs. At first they seem scary, and darn Gandy can't keep his hands from fiddling with things that could be booby traps. But the adventure takes a turn for the better, as the tomb becomes filled with sexy, scantily clad kitties.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
